title: Taliyah Login Music

embed.description: Or: Toph - Login Screen League of Legends Login Screens - Taliyah (Release: 18th May 2016) ‚óè DOWNLOAD Music: http://bit.ly/TaliyahMusic Login Screen File: http://bit.ly/TaliyahLogin

body:
I feel like we don't often appreciate the work Riot does in creating beauty.

I just wanted to say how AMAZING the login music is for Taliyah. Idk who you've got working in your music department, but they are doing a phenomenal job at producing lush and vibrant soundscapes, the music is original, fitting and a pleasure to listen to!

Thanks for all your hard work!

replies.body:
I mean, yea sure, they did a great job.

But you don't need to say that EVERY TIME they release a login screen do you?

You may be new based upon you saying that this is your first post, but there have been many posts congratulating the sound team for their great work on the logins, especially for Taliyah's in which there might have been around a dozen made. On the other hand, I see nothing wrong with showing your appreciation by making a post, even for old logins or other creations of riot. It often brings back good memories, introduces those who are new to the community of those great pieces, and shows riot examples of what we like and/or want more of. So by all means, post away.
My favorite part is near 1:00 it gave me goosebumps it was so good
